languages.text: "Возмутительная выходка, неуважение, которое проявили и к вам, и ко мне. К сожалению, подобные инциденты — нечто вроде стихийного бедствия для Футфола. Их невозможно предсказать или упредить — они просто случаются".

traits.locale_text: "Возмутительная выходка, неуважение, которое проявили и к вам, и ко мне. К сожалению, подобные инциденты — нечто вроде стихийного бедствия для Футфола. Их невозможно предсказать или упредить — они просто случаются".

languages.text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."
languages.original_text: "Возмутительная выходка, неуважение, которое проявили и к вам, и ко мне. К сожалению, подобные инциденты — нечто вроде стихийного бедствия для Футфола. Их невозможно предсказать или упредить — они просто случаются".

traits.locale_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents are something of a natural disaster for Footfall. They are impossible to predict or preempt — they simply happen."

"An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents are something of a natural disaster for Footfall. They are impossible to predict or preempt — they simply happen."
"An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."
"An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."
"An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

languages.text: 「とんでもなく大胆な行動は、君と私に対する軽蔑の表れだ。悲しいかな、フットフォールでそのような事件は自然災害のようなもの…予測や事前回避は不可能で、ただ起こってしまうのさ」
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: 「とんでもなく大胆な行動は、君と私に対する軽蔑の表れだ。悲しいかな、フットフォールでそのような事件は自然災害のようなもの…予測や事前回避は不可能で、ただ起こってしまうのさ」

languages.text: “这真是令人发指的暴行，是对我们的侮辱。遗憾的是，在落脚港，这种事情就像自然灾害一样，无法预测，也无法阻止。它们就是这样，意外地发生了。”
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: “这真是令人发指的暴行，是对我们的侮辱。遗憾的是，在落脚港，这种事情就像自然灾害一样，无法预测，也无法阻止。它们就是这样，意外地发生了。”

languages.text: «Una artimaña deplorable, una falta de respeto hacia usted y hacia mí. Por desgracia, en Paso este tipo de incidentes son como las catástrofes naturales: imposibles de predecir o prever, pero ocurren».
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: «Una artimaña deplorable, una falta de respeto hacia usted y hacia mí. Por desgracia, en Paso este tipo de incidentes son como las catástrofes naturales: imposibles de predecir o prever, pero ocurren».

languages.text: « Un incident scandaleux qui dénote un manque de respect flagrant à votre encontre comme à la mienne. Hélas, ces malencontreux événements sont semblables à des catastrophes naturelles à Castel : impossibles à prédire ou à anticiper, ils surviennent sans crier gare. »
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: « Un incident scandaleux qui dénote un manque de respect flagrant à votre encontre comme à la mienne. Hélas, ces malencontreux événements sont semblables à des catastrophes naturelles à Castel : impossibles à prédire ou à anticiper, ils surviennent sans crier gare. »

languages.text: "Eine unerhörte Aktion und eine Respektlosigkeit gegenüber Euch und mir. Leider sind solche Vorfälle auf Footfall wie Naturkatastrophen – man kann sie nicht vorhersehen oder verhindern, sie passieren einfach."
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: "Eine unerhörte Aktion und eine Respektlosigkeit gegenüber Euch und mir. Leider sind solche Vorfälle auf Footfall wie Naturkatastrophen – man kann sie nicht vorhersehen oder verhindern, sie passieren einfach."

languages.text: "Çirkin bir olay, size olduğu kadar bana da yapılmış bir saygısızlık. Ne yazık ki Binliman'da bu tür hadiseler doğal afetten farksızdır. Tahmin edilmesi veya önlenmesi imkânsızdır, bir anda oluverirler."
languages.original_text: "An outrageous stunt, a show of disrespect for both you and me. Sadly, such incidents on Footfall are akin to natural disasters — impossible to predict or pre-empt, they simply happen."

traits.locale_text: "Çirkin bir olay, hem size hem de bana saygısızlık... Ne yazık ki Binliman'da bu tür olaylara doğal afet gözüyle bakılır, tahmin edilmesi veya önlenmesi imkânsızdır, yaşanır."
